archimate:Node.name: Virtualization Host Server (VHSv)
archimate:Node.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Server virtualization environment, hosting multiple virtual machines (VMs) for clinical and administrative applications, ensuring high utilization and flexibility.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: o Dual Intel Xeon Scalable or AMD EPYC processors (16–24 cores each, optimized for virtualization). • Memory Capacity: o Minimum 512 GB ECC RAM, expandable to support large numbers of VMs. • Storage Capacity and Configuration Options: o NVMe-based storage (4 TB) for hypervisor o Connection to external SAN/NAS storage for scalable virtual machine storage. • Network Connectivity: o Quad-port 10GbE minimum (supports high-performance VM networking) o 25GbE/40GbE connectivity available for future scalability. • Form Factor: o Rack-mounted (1U–2U), space-efficient. • Redundancy Features: o Dual redundant power supplies o RAID configuration (local SSD) o Redundant network ports o Hot-swappable fans. • Power Supply Rating: o Dual redundant PSU (800–1200W, 80 PLUS Platinum). • Cooling System: o Hot-swappable redundant cooling fans. • Virtualization Support: o VMware vSphere certified, Microsoft Hyper-V supported, Citrix compatible. • Operating System Compatibility: o VMware ESXi, Windows Server with Hyper-V, Linux-based virtualization platforms.
